Detailed Description

This is the base class defining the interface shared by all particle system actions.

All actions have a delay attribute. The action will not perform its actions until after the specified time as passed. There is also a minimum age attribute. The action will affect only the particles that are over that minimum age.

void ParticleSystemAction::delay ( float  seconds  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the delay attribute.

Setting the delay attribute automatically resets the age_ attribute to zero.

Parameters:
seconds The new delay time in seconds.

float ParticleSystemAction::delay ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the delay attribute.

The delay attribute is the time in seconds after the starting time of the action before which the action takes no further action.

The default value is 0.0 seconds.

Returns:
Time in seconds until the action is active.

void ParticleSystemAction::enabled ( bool  state  ) 

This is the Get-Accessor for the particle system action's preview visible property.

Parameters:
state The new value of the particle system's visible flag.

bool ParticleSystemAction::enabled ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the particle system actions's preview visible flag.

If this flag is set then the particle system action will not effect the particle system.

Returns:
The current value of the particle system's visible flag.

void ParticleSystemAction::minimumAge ( float  seconds  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the minimumAge attribute.

Parameters:
seconds The new minimumAge in seconds.

float ParticleSystemAction::minimumAge ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the minimumAge attribute.

The minimumAge attribute is the minimum age for a particle before the action will act upon it.

The default value is 0.0 seconds.

Returns:
The minimum particle age in seconds.

void ParticleSystemAction::prerequisitesOfType ( DataSectionPtr  pSect,
std::set< std::string > &  output 
) [static]

This static method returns all of the resources that will be required to create the particle system action.

It is designed so that the resources can be loaded in the loading thread before constructing the particle system
